item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature data type contains general information relating to all the advertising features of a single SoftLayer hardware generic component model. Local features An html formatted list of all features. Type: string price A hardware component's upgrade price. Type: string Relational hardwareGenericComponentModel The generic component model for a list of advertising or marketing features Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic
